summary: Fat Andy - Fat Andy is degen addition to the Boys Club, created by Matt Furie himself. Overindulging in all the market dips and let’s just say, a lot of other stuff too has led him to pack on the pounds. He’s not worried about what people think of him; he’s very comfortable in his muscular body. His favorite foods are Korean barbecue, ribeye steaks, Mexican food, pizzas and burgers !! Join the Fat community, where we devour dips for fun and grow the market cap into the millions!
